entry.title: Plushie fun
entry.content:
Today I made a BIG Flimsy doll!
Just wanted to share her with you.




Also got some dolls ready to package up and send away, bye guys!


Made a couple of custom dolls as well. Too cute!



Loves to you all,
R xxxx

entry.title: Flimsy Christmas
entry.content:
Hello there, Flimsy fans,
I thought I'd take this occasion of the 1st of Christmas-Month to remind you of the lovely Christmas cards which were available last year. They're now back in stock and ready for you to order - w00t! So if you head over to the Flimsy shop you will also find jewellery, t shirts, dolls and other goodies: http://www.rachaelsmith.org/page.asp?id=4
Or if you use those dollar things, you might prefer here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/FlimsyKitten
I urge you to do ALL your Christmas shopping here, so I can eat and stuff, yeah? Yeah.




Merry December everyone!
R (and F) xxxx
